data.text: @IsabelMartins @JLo @PHVegas So awesome Isabel, I hope the rest of your weekend is awesome❗😀👍 *KL
@ZapposTheater @JLo @PHVegas You better believe it KL @ZapposTheater !! Every day I try to do my part, it’s even in my bio. 😂 A little laughter, a little kindness, both go a long way 💜
@IsabelMartins @JLo @PHVegas We are glad we could brighten your day Isabel and hope that someday you will be able to pay some kindness forward as well💗 *KL https://t.co/D1pPsUMJ2N
@ZapposTheater @JLo @PHVegas Like I said, #OverAndAbove service 👌🏻 Thank you to #TeamZappos for being decent, human & spreading kindness. Super grateful. 💜 https://t.co/z1NHEdqpWN
@IsabelMartins @JLo @PHVegas So glad we could make your trip a little better and make you smile Isabel❕ *KL https://t.co/PK8bdKaqnS

@ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo When #TeamZapposTheater send a birthday 🎁 to your hotel @PHVegas b/c they know of the #Viagogo tix fiasco.
What a most fantastic team of people who #MakeADifference & provide over-and-above customer service,when you’re NOT even their customer.  Thank you @ZapposTheater Team 🎉💜 https://t.co/pUyDQC3j3I

@lally_sam @ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo @PHVegas Single Mama on vacation with her son! Trip of a life time to see #JloVegas  #OhItsMyBirthdaytoo  Thanks #Viagogo for the fraudent tickets 🎁 #September1st
@IsabelMartins @viagogo @JLo You are very welcome Isabel😀👍 *KL
@ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo Thanks again AU , MG & KL from @ZapposTheater ! Your words are quite appreciated! #GreatPeopleAtZapposTheater

@lally_sam @ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo @PHVegas Playing #JLo ‘s #DINERO #AllDayEveryday to bring #GoodKarma and see if @viagogo will finally give me the #FullRefundPlease #JloVegas https://t.co/Htre0BGhpX
@IsabelMartins @ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo @PHVegas This is our family reunion, gone wrong!
@IsabelMartins @ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo @PHVegas We’re in the Venetian!

@lally_sam @ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo @PHVegas Fantastic question! Not to mention all the other fans, artists and sporting teams #viagogo has done this too!  #NotRightAtAll #September1st #JLoVegas 

Are you staying at @PHVegas too?

Dear @viagogo 
Do a gal right on her birthday & return a #FullRefundPlease for premium #Dinero paid for #JLoVegas tickets #September1st You sold them fraudulently. Won’t be @PHVegas on rescheduled date & would have never purchased tickets,if the proper dates were updated! #Jlo
@IsabelMartins @ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo @PHVegas I wonder if JLo knows what’s going on?

@lally_sam @ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo AU & MG from the @ZapposTheater team could teach @viagogo some tips in customer service.  The @PHVegas hotel staff is pretty fantastic too. 👌🏻 Thanks for making this a brighter birthday considering there’s no #JLoVegas tonight. #Viagogo #FullRefundPlease 💵

@lally_sam @ZapposTheater @viagogo @JLo Unfortunately Sam, I’ve found in the last few days, there’s a ton of people who have been fraudulently scammed from #viagogo out of proper purchases tickets for #Jlovegas Sept 1st show.  Vacations planned around the date & premium $$ paid to see tonight’s show #FullRefundPlease

@ZapposTheater @IsabelMartins @viagogo @JLo No #JLo concert for us #viagogo sold us concert tickets for a rescheduled concert. We bought tickets for September 1st performance. #Viagogo were notified March 2018 of the rescheduling, we bought our tickets June 2018 #outofpocket going to #Lasvegas no concert. #scam #JLoVegas
@IsabelMartins @viagogo @JLo Hey there Isabel! I'm sorry to hear you've had some scheduling conflict. Could you please DM us to see if we can help? *AU

Hey @viagogo ! In Vegas right now, you know for the #Jlovegas tickets you sold to me 6 days ago? Event coordinators sent out rescheduling notification months ago, NOT on Aug29th for @JLo @ZapposTheater Sept 1st concert. You’re ruining a gal’s birthday & vacation. #RefundPlease
